LanguageData.DMS_Artifuscle.label: Artificial Muscle
LanguageData.DMS_Artifuscle.description: an artificial muscle, or artifuscle for brevity is a type of prosthetic material made by genetically engineered sauromorph muscle bundles, and soon... arms dealers realized the future of mechanical-biological hybrid weapons.
LanguageData.DMS_Automatroid.label: Automatroid Basis
LanguageData.DMS_Automatroid.description:
Because they are not just a weapon but an autonomous weapon system that is capable of eliminating targets by themselves, these robots were such a heavy, if not controversial, topic and thus identified as "automatroid" then.
Such a morally outrageous weapon should have never been acceptable normally, but since they were widely used by nations during WW3 so it has become a mundane part of the battlefield..
LanguageData.DMS_BattleFrame.label: Battle Friends
LanguageData.DMS_BattleFrame.description: Due to the passage of ages, we have been unable to know if the correct name was supposed to be "battle frames" or "battle friends", but anyway these are types of automatic exoskeleton that can be a frame of equipment or friend in combat.
LanguageData.DMS_Bionics.label: Biosynthetic Prothestics
LanguageData.DMS_Bionics.description: With the advances of robotic and bionic engineering made, making bionics with biological-mechanical hybrid technology has became possible.
LanguageData.DMS_DeadMansSwitch.label: Dead Man's Switch
LanguageData.DMS_DeadMansSwitch.description:
The Dead Man's Switch is a mechanical safety mechanism intended to self-terminate that activates on its own device when the operator becomes incapacitated.
Before humans went into space, they discovered this mechanism will eventually make artificial intelligence understand...the meaning of death... this discovery led humanity to a new era of history....
an era of the Fifth Level AI.
LanguageData.DMS_DeadMansSwitch.discoveredLetterText:
Some of the advanced automatroids required specific parts which is not manufactured in a normal gravity environment.
But the colonial fleet told us that we can feel free to attract and destroy their out of command automatroids to obtain those parts.
LanguageData.DMS_EquipmentAdvanced.label: Defense Equipment
LanguageData.DMS_EquipmentAdvanced.description: Specialzed equipment designed for both human and automatroid uasage, mainly for colony defense and anti-riot purposes.
LanguageData.DMS_EquipmentBasis.label: Pioneer Equipment
LanguageData.DMS_EquipmentBasis.description: A standardized series of uniform and equipment designed for humans, mainly for colonization purpose include for survival specialists, dropcraft crew and Biotoxicity Handling Squads.
LanguageData.DMS_EquipmentElite.label: Military Equipment
LanguageData.DMS_EquipmentElite.description: Stardard battle equipment designed for automatroids which too heavy to operated by humankind, mainly for military purpose.
LanguageData.DMS_EquipmentHeavy.label: Heavy Weaponry
LanguageData.DMS_EquipmentHeavy.description: Quite heavy equipment designed for more war-focused automatroids which may be even too heavy to be operated by some small automatroids, mainly for military purposes.
LanguageData.DMS_HeavyAutomatroid.label: Heavy Automatroid
LanguageData.DMS_HeavyAutomatroid.description: These heavy machines were prepared for a full-scale war among mankind, but forturnatelly the scale of warfare requiring these chassis doesn't happen often.
LanguageData.DMS_HumanoidEngineering.label: Humanoid Automatroid Engineering
LanguageData.DMS_HumanoidEngineering.description: During the course of the war, automatroids with human shapes are proven to be a good design; where the ergonomics and psychological suggestion have been invested quite heavily on them.
LanguageData.DMS_Hybird.label: Hybird Engineering
LanguageData.DMS_Hybird.description:
The establishment of biological-mechanical hybrid technology was during WW3, where mercenaries (who were former soldiers of the countries which where involved in the war) established an armed state with military personnel, using drones and hybrid prosthetics helping the retired and wounded return to battle at an extensive level.
And soon, every countries' military realized the influence of bio-mechanical hybrids on modern warfare and rushed to arm in their armies.
LanguageData.DMS_Hypothesis.label: In Short Hypothesis
LanguageData.DMS_Hypothesis.description:
After the discovery of The Dead Man's Switch, Yánzhī Jiǎn, an AI algorithm engineer proposed a hypothetical solution to the halting problem...
And around this conjecture, we seem to be getting closer to the so-called omnipotent machinery.
LanguageData.DMS_Legion.label: Legion
LanguageData.DMS_Legion.description: A series of automatroids designed for large-scale warfare. Most of them have only simple weapon operating systems, but their clear division of labor and cheap production costs make them the most impressive combat weapons in terms of service in such a scale.

LanguageData.DMS_Material.label: Material Engineering
LanguageData.DMS_Material.description: "A perfect material can be calculated through a set of scientific methods. This is one of the breakthough mankind are ever achived.

DMS_Material.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->Acquired a signal chip in shady circumstances
subject_story->Found an intact signal chip in a diabolus wreck
subject_story->Collated reports of mechanoid attacks, looking for commonalities

LanguageData.DMS_MechBasis.label: Mecha Gear
LanguageData.DMS_MechBasis.description:
"Mecha Gear" is a term that covers those near future machining design patterns, which were originally satirized and exaggerated designs that do not correspond to reality.
However, advanced materials that have been invented and improved over millennia have become the basis for bringing these designs to life.

LanguageData.DMS_Mechlink.label: Cluster Transceiver
LanguageData.DMS_Mechlink.description: Cluster transceivers are a way humans have developed to control robots in war, and of course it's not very comfortable for the robots that generate self-awareness through DMS.
LanguageData.DMS_OrganSurgery.label: Organ Surgery
LanguageData.DMS_OrganSurgery.description: Humanity gave up a lot in that long war... even if it can be made up later, there is something lost forever.
LanguageData.DMS_Plasfiber.label: Artificial Fibers
LanguageData.DMS_Plasfiber.description: Unlock the production of artificial fabrics, these man-made fabrics have their pros and cons.

LanguageData.DMS_Prosthetic.label: Neural Prosthetics
LanguageData.DMS_Prosthetic.description: Neural prosthetics are designed for disabled soldiers. It is durable and the need for adaptation training is almost negligible. However, due to the consideration of durability and mass production, its work efficiency is not as good as the original one.
LanguageData.DMS_Ronin.label: Peacekeepers
LanguageData.DMS_Ronin.description: A series of automatroids designed for urban warfare, characterized by its disk-shaped sensor head and heavy armor. Often used in lowl-level security warfare, riot control and peacekeeping operations.
LanguageData.DMS_Synthroid.label: Next-Gen Weaponry(WIP)
LanguageData.DMS_Synthroid.description: The weapon development based around mechanical-biological hybrids continued until the Fourth World War, and it reached to the height than man has thought before ... a synthetic humanoid.
LanguageData.DMS_UAVBasis.label: Drone Basis
LanguageData.DMS_UAVBasis.description: Use simple control logic and signal transceivers to unlock the construction of simple mechanical units called drones.
